Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay! We'll be back next time we're in Branson.”
Reviews.Author: Mike M
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at The Brick House, in Branson, MO. The rate was great. The location was perfect. Out of the way, quite, but close to the 76 strip as well as the colored routes to get around Branson and miss the traffic. Peggy Heiser, General Manager, was the main reason we came back to the Brick House to spend our long Labor Day vacation. Peggy is friendly, helpful, and her warm personality makes you feel like your staying with family (the good kind of family). The rooms were clean, well kept, and very spacious. The outdoor pool is in the back and is very private from the steet. We will be back on our next trip to Branson. :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value, Excellent Comfort, Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: Sara s
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel because of the reviews and the photos of the rooms and pool. I was not disappointed! As a matter of fact it was more than I expected. The photos do not do the rooms justice, they are simple but so very comfortable and clean!!! I looked and looked to find a flaw, there were none. They were sound proof as well because I stayed next door to a nice family with many kids and once we were in our rooms I couldn't hear a thing. The indoor hallways were newly carpeted and painted and smelled really fresh. The beds were so comfortable as cited and the bedding was very homey, not at all like a hotel. We had a flat screen television with good selection and we used the WIFI which was very fast, we requested a refrigerator and microwave and they were delivered by friendly staff within minutes, literally. They were not overly busy and when I asked why the front desk associate who was very polite and knowledgable by the way explained they were new owners and Managers and had not the opportunity to build the business up as they were only open a couple of months. Trust me when this secret gets out there will be a waiting list to get to this hotel....very well done!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Shelly R
Reviews.Content: We stayed 5 nights in August. Was a great stay. Peggy and Rod were great!! The staff was very friendly and knowledgable about the area. The rooms were emaculately clean. I had biscuts and gravy every morning... :) The price was better than great for the room and service. Our next trip to Branson will definitely be spent at The Brick House!!

Reviews.Title: “Very accommodating”
Reviews.Author: suezp
Reviews.Content: The Brick House was a nice change from the average hotel! We spent one night here and was very impressed with our warm welcome upon reception. They were updating and we could see very nice newly installed carpet. We had a pet and was given one of the pet rooms on the 1st floor which was one level down. Pet fee was $25. The room itself was very clean (including the bathroom with NO MOLD/MILDEW)--no pet smells! The furniture was nice, the beds were very comfortable, and we could not hear people in neighboring rooms. This is not an upscale room, but geared to comfort and room is practical. There was a continental breakfast with donuts, cereal, fresh fruit, coffee, juice, hot gravy and biscuits, and a waffle maker for waffles. The biscuits and gravy weren't the best and the donuts tasted as if they had been frozen--other than this, it was pretty good as far as selection. We were out the main traffic area and could get around with ease. Plenty of places to eat and the Tanger Outlet was easy to get to, only a few miles away. We definitely would stay here again if we had our pet with us.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden jewel”
Reviews.Author: Fred P
Reviews.Content: This hotel is just a little way from the 76 strip. But what a delight it is. My family and I spent two nights here. The room was clean and neat. Beds were soft and comfortable.The halls were well lit and smelled fresh. Morning breakfast was filling...included biscuits and gravy, waffles, fresh fruit, cereal, and oatmeal. The pool was small, but well maintained. The water was perfect in the heat of the afternoon. Ironing boards, iron, and a hair dryer were not in our room, but were provided quickly when requested from the front desk. if you are looking for a quiet place to relax at the end of the day, this is it.

Reviews.Title: “Superior Place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Marjorie D
Reviews.Content: I was truly impressed when I drove by this Brick House Hotel.. and I turned around & went back to be 'welcomed'. by this friendly lady, known now as Peggy.. and we visited and I was very comfortable and most definitely a Very Clean Place.. and the remodeling was some present, but was no bother at all.. this was explained to me of this going on.. The room was very clean & oh the bed comfortable . I know when I go back to Branson, this will be my place to stay & knowing I'll get good nights rest.. and being greeted by the manager Peggy & her husband., is such a blessing too.. I didn't mention, I was alone on this trip & I felt very safe & secure staying here.. You all will have to believe what ones say of this "Brick House Hotel" for your own self and you won't be sorry you did.. Thanks again Peggy.. Enjoyed our visits too..

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: Debbie C
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Brick House Hotel and couldn't be happier with the whole experience. The staff was very friendly, welcoming and efficient. Our room was clean and roomy and the bed was amazingly comfortable. I absolutely loved the pillows! We used the pool several times it was very clean and inviting and it also provides a wonderful view. We were so comfortable at the Brick House Hotel that we have already made reservations to go back in November.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience - Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Familyof123_12
Reviews.Content: I did not have reservations before arriving in Branson. We came upon this motel and looked nice and clean from outside. Patty greeted me immediately. I commented about how nice the lobby looked and she told me that they had recently changed ownership or management (not sure) and were renovating. The room was spacious and very clean. In my opinion, the beds and pillows were quite comfortable. I needed a hairdryer and iron/ironing board. I called the front desk and she had it to me within a couple of minutes.....literally. The breakfast room was very spacious and had several breakfast foods to choose from.....biscuits & gravy, waffles, cereal, bagels, fruit, juice, milk, coffee. While we did not use the pool, it was clean and looked inviting. The location is in a more quiet area on Shepherd of the Hills Parkway located near Roark Valley Drive - easy access to the Blue and Red Routes. We will definitely try to stay here again.

HotelInfo.Name: The Brick House Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 2651 Shepherd of the Hills Expy, Branson, MO 65616 (Formerly Welcome Inn)
